options.name: Contracted
options.description: Additionally, you learn 4 Beginner Spells from your Patron's school of magic

options.name: Martial Knowledge
options.description: Gain +1 Damage to all Melee Weapons and +1 Strength

options.name: Guiding Hand
options.description: Gain +1 Spell Attack and +1 to Melee Attacks.

options.name: Gift of Focus
options.description: Gain +1 Concentration and Immunity to the Charmed Condition

options.name: Gift of Comprehension
options.description: Learn the Magical Language of your Patron and gain +1 Insight

options.name: Improved Pact
options.description: Learn 4 Novice Level Spells of your Patron's school of magic and gain a Pact Familiar.

options.name: Action : Infused Weapon
options.description: You make a Weapon Attack but convert the Primary Damage to Arcane Damage. If you are fully aligned with your Patron, you gain a 1d4 Bonus to your Attack Roll.

options.name: Free Action : Infused Spell
options.description: You Charge a Spell from your Patron's school of magic. If you are not fully aligned with your Patron, your Spell Attack has a 1d4 penalty.

options.name: Journeyman Pact Magic
options.description: Learn 4 Journeyman Level Spells of your Patron's school of magic and gain +1 Spell Attack.

options.name: Reaction : Planar Defense
options.description: In response to being targeted by an Attack, make a Persuasion Check instead of your normal Defense Check. On a success, your Patron defends you from the Attack and you take no Damage.

options.name: Pact Bound
options.description: Learn 4 Expert Level Spells of your Patron's School of Magic, At level 10, learn 2 Master Spells of your Patron's schools of magic. Additionally, gain +1 Spell Attack and +1 Spell Damage.

options.name: Reaction [Daily] : Favor of the Patron
options.description: In response to making any Skill Check, add 2d4 to the result. This is decreased to a 1d4 if you have negative alignment with your Patron and does not add any bonus if you have -3 alignment.

options.name: Pact Alignment
options.description: Your Patron lends you power with the expectation that your actions will align with their interests. You start your Pact fully aligned with your Patron. When you defy the wishes of your Patron, you lose an alignment, up to a maximum of 3. For each alignment you lose, your Spell Attacks from your Patron's School of Magic suffer a -1 Attack Penalty. At -3 alignment, you can no longer Channel Spells from your Patron's School. Alignment can be restored by fulfilling tasks for your Patron or taking significant actions that please them.
